mapper.select: SELECT WC2.*, GI.GU_NM FROM ( SELECT WEATHER_ID , GU_CD , TEMP , MIN_TEMP , MAX_TEMP , FEELS_LIKE_TEMP , WEATHER_DESC , WEATHER_ICON_ID , HUMIDITY , WIND_SPEED , MS_DT , CRT_BY , CRT_DT , MOD_BY , MOD_DT FROM (SELECT WC1.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY WC1.GU_CD ORDER BY WC1.MS_DT DESC) AS RNUM FROM WEATHER_CURRENT WC1) WHERE GU_CD = #{gu_Cd} AND RNUM = 1) WC2 INNER JOIN GU_INFO GI ON WC2.GU_CD = GI.GU_CD
